title: my clubs r all gone but according to friends im still in them
body: i cant change which tag i want to use and i wanna use my kesha tag but im owner of that club so i cant have my friend kick me then reinvite me and i need help riot plz ;-;

replies.body: There were some [club issues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016) a bit ago that caused some issues similar to what you're explaining.  Let me know the exact name and tag of your club so I can look into your specific issue.  Let me know!
my club tag is Kesha and the name is #FreeKesha also thank u in advance for being a buddy

Wake up in the mornin' feelin' like P-orocles
Grab my coffee I'm out the door I'm gonna hit the forum
Before I leave brush ma skills with a bottle of baddies
Your club is refreshed, you animal!

(Cringe, I know that was awful! :D)
